articles.content: Runescape is one of the oldest and most popular MMO franchises out there, and it’s coming to Android devices this Summer. This week, the game’s developer Jagex, announced that Runescape is officially… [+2125 chars]

articles.title: Valorant Episode 2 Act 3 to get some sun with the New Tropical Island “Breeze” card - Gaming Ideology
articles.description: Valorant Episode 2 Act 3 should start soon, and it will add something big to the mix – a new map! It’s been nearly six months since Valorant got a new battlefield – Icebox last October – so it’s about time. The new map, Breeze, has a sunny tropical island the…
